#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
const int mod=1000003;
using namespace std;
int R,C,M,a[1010][1010],b[1010][1010];

//int getchar_unlocked()  {return getchar();}
inline void Read(int &x) {
	register int ch = getchar_unlocked();
	x = 0;
	for(; ((ch<48 || ch>57) && ch != '-'); ch = getchar_unlocked());
	for(; ch>47 && ch<58 ; ch = getchar_unlocked()) {
		x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + ch- 48;
	}
}

int get(int x,int y){
	int sum=0;
	if(x>1) sum+=b[x-1][y];
	if(y>1) sum+=b[x][y-1];
	if(y>1 and x>1) sum+=b[x-1][y-1];
	return sum%mod;
}

char buf[21];int ix;
//int putchar_unlocked(char ch) { return putchar(ch);  }
inline void writeInt(int x) {
     ix = 20;
     buf[20] = '\n';
     do 
     {
        buf[--ix] = (x % 10) + '0';
        x/= 10;
     }while(x);
     do
     {
        putchar_unlocked(buf[ix]);
     } while (buf[ix++] != '\n');
}



int main(){
	int t,i,j,k,xx,yy;
	Read(t);
	while(t--){
		Read(R); Read(C); Read(M);
		for(i=1;i<=R;i++) for(j=1;j<=C;j++){ a[i][j]=0; b[i][j]=0; }
		for(i=0;i<M;i++){
			Read(xx); Read(yy);
			a[xx][yy]=1;
		}
		//for(i=1;i<=R;i++) {for(j=1;j<=C;j++){ cout<< a[i][j]<<","<<b[i][j]<<"\t"; } cout<<endl; }
		b[1][1]=1;
		for(int su=3;su<=R+C;su++){
			for(j=1,i=su-j;i>0;i--,j++){
				if(i>R or j>C) continue;
				if(a[i][j]==1) b[i][j]=0;
				else { b[i][j]=get(i,j); }
			}
		}
		writeInt(b[R][C]); 
	}
	return 0;
}
